message.content:
1. Group I is referred to as the paravertebral group.
2. Group I received a single dose of spinal anesthesia.
3. The spinal anesthesia was with 2.5 mL 0.5% bupivacaine (heavy).
4. Group I also received a continuous infusion in the paravertebral space.
5. The continuous infusion was of 0.125% bupivacaine.
6. The rate of the continuous infusion was 5 mL/h.

messages.content:
Statement: Group I (paravertebral group) received a single dose of spinal anesthesia with 2.5 mL 0.5% bupivacaine (heavy) + a continuous infusion of 0.125% bupivacaine at 5 mL/h in the paravertebral space.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
